headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Discounts
content:
Join the ranks of the nightlife glitterati: Nightclubs and their additional Storage are both 30% off this week. Players can also get 40% off the RC Bandito and there’s an array of other discounted vehicles this week, including:

- JoBuilt P-996 LAZER – 30% off
- Progen GP1 – 30% off
- Mammoth Avenger – 40% off
- HVY Nightshark – 40% off

And more! Check out the Rockstar Newswire for more details.
